metadata.title: CVE-2020-26954 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: When accepting a malicious intent from other installed apps, Firefox forAndroid accepted manifests from arbitrary file paths and allowed declaringwebapp manifests for other origins. This could be used to gain fullscreenaccess for UI spoofing and could also lead to cross-origin attacks ontargeted websites. *Note: This issue only affected Firefox for Android.Other operating systems are unaffected.*. This vulnerability affectsFirefox < 83.

criterions.comment: mozjs38: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
mozjs52: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
